name: Super Crate Box
description: Vlambeer's SUPER CRATE BOX is coming to bring back the glory of the golden arcade age, when all that really mattered was getting on that high score list. Grab your baseball cap and loosen your pants, it's time to fight endless hordes of enemies and collect every weapon crate you can.
minimum_requirements: OS:Windows XP Processor:1.2 Ghz Memory:512 MB RAM DirectX®:8.0 Hard Drive:100 MB HD space
recommended_requirements: OS:Windows XP, Vista or 7 Processor:2.2 Ghz Memory:512 MB RAM DirectX®:8.0 Hard Drive:100 MB HD space

reviews.review_text: It's like Call of Duty but with better graphics.

Overall, this game would be the ABSOLUTE MEANING of 'FREE' ('free' and 'f2p' is a very different word, f2p= It's free to unlock MOST of the MAIN FEATURES of the game. While 'free' means ALL of the FEATURES of the game) I don't see any part/weapons or stuffs that needs 'real money' to get it.  Gameplay's very simple; run, hide, shoot, repeat, don't get killed by those monsters/your own weapon (i.e: disc bullet, fire), and get those crates. Go for a highscore, unlock arenas, weapons, and random characters.  I have 1 problem. TOO SIMPLISTIC. If you've unlocked all unlockables, it would be boring to repeat gameplay. You guys should add another gamemodes in DLC/free updates. It's OK for DLC releases which would cost around 10 cents/1 dollar as long as it add gameplay, or maybe Storyline?
Amazing game, it could run on a tinfoil potato. 10/10
It's like Skyrim but with guns.

My playing experience with this game:  -Did Tutorial -Game Crashes -Game Gives Error Message Citing Missing DLL -Takes 2 Hours to install DLL -Try first level -Falls in fire -Game Crashes -Unlocks Diskgun Thingy -Kills ten Aliens at once -Dies from Discgun -Game Crashes -Breaks High Score and Unlocks second level -Game Crashes -Opens Game -Game Crashes -Looks at Game Page on Steam -Computer Crashes  6/10 Be- <Computer Explodes>
very good game , easy graphics ,simplicity is beauty   + 10+ weapons + enough monsters + good map  + sometimes hardcore :)  -nothing
This game has no remorse on how you feel. That's a good thing.

This game is frustratingly fun. I really mean it. The more I enjoyed this game, the more i got frustrated whenever I got hit by an enemy MANY, MANY, M-A-N-Y times. The game is a classic mix of shooting and platformer game where you collect a number of crates that hold weapons. Each level has a required number of crates in order to be cleared. You also unlock new weapons whenever you collected a specified number of crates. It's free so there's no hurt in trying and who knows, maybe you might find this game very FRUSTRATINGLY FUN too. :)
This game is really fun and addicting, even though I can't beat level one. However, everytime I am about to pass it, it crashes.
It's probably one of the most addicting games I have ever played. And one of the best.
Great little timekiller. It's free as well, so you should give it a go.
It's not as addicting as everybody says.
10/10 would bang. Srsly this game is pretty addicting. Definetly worth the cost of $0.00

this game is a half platformer half rage-endusing survival with the never ending onslaught of enemys trying to keep you from getting to your precious crate and you having to collect the crates and having to adjust to your new found weapon that you got from the crate makes this game insanely hard and insanely addictive. P.S. it is free to play so why not try it for a little while!

This is a really intresting Game.... it is very fun, you can easily get addicted. It has a special scoring system that is easy to undertand but hard to achieve a really high score. This is one of those games that you can play for an hour or two and feel like five minutes passed. For a free game...... This is totally worth your time!
This is the most simplistic and limited game you will ever play. Yet it is somehow insanely amazing
Overall, Super Crate Box is a pretty cool free game. Just buy it.

Great little game to play for an hour or so but gets tedious evetually.  I tend to find myself coming back to this game every so often to play for a bit and then i forget about it for a couple of weeks and then play it again.   Good for the casual gamer
does'nt take too much memory and very addictive i personly recommend it, 9/10 is my score.

It is a very obscure game in my opinion. I do not know anyone that owns it. It is a very colorful, addictive game. Sometimes, it feels more like Flappy Bird because, we all know it is a bad game, but is jut addictive.  7.3/10

This surely is one of the best arcade games I ever played. First the game looked really hard to me but as i got into it and started playing with a gamepad I began to like it a lot. Sadly GameMaker's audio interface doesn't work on windows 8/8.1 and crashes the game every few minutes.
This is my review :)

THIS GAME IS FREE THIS GAME DOWNLOADS IN UNDER 5 SECONDS (Depending on internet) THIS GAME IS LIKE...................................................................................MARIO WITH GUNS NOT REALLY BUT ITS STILL AWESOME IT IS A CLASSIC 8BIT THEMED GAME, NO CAPS LOCK WASN'T ON!

This game is great, it mixes the rougelike element of permideath with beautiful pixel-art, a good variety of weapons, and an extreme difficulty. The gameplay is really fast paced and is very fun. This is one of those games that I could lose hours to because it has that 'just one more unlock' feel to it. The weapons are pretty unbalenced, as mentioned by another reviewer, but I think that that ADDS to the game because you have to constantly change your strategy and it makes you more desperste to get to the next crate. It is also COMPLETELY FREE (to my knowledge) so there is NO EXCUSE not to pick this up right now and start playing it! It could use more player characters though, like if the developer could get some kind of license to Duke Nukem or Doomguy, it would be awesome to see those two again in a good game. Or if some kind of pixel 'blood' was added.
Great game, but I'm on Win 8 So it crashes alot and says im still mplaying when i try to open it. Cant complain because its free but... please devs please fix it I love this game so much.
This is a game which is fun.

Super Crate Box. First, i think this game is bad. 2nd, the graphics makes me think this game is 2x bad.  But, when i play this game. I think i was wrong. First, this 8bit platformer or sidescroller game have a good gameplay. 2nd, the graphics looks cute :p  Finally, i think this game is cool. You should catch 10 crates and that won't be easy. Every crates have a cool weapon and you can get a new weapon by completing a task. Creative and addictive. (8.5/10)
Want to revive the good old days of arcade machines and high scores? This game is for you.

For a free game, this is awesome. It’s really fun, fast paced, addictive and even if you die every 5 seconds like I do, it doesn’t make you want to throw your PC out the window.  Thumbs up. Good game.

Are you tired of the 3D shoot 'em ups? Are you tired of choosing what weapons you will use? THEN THIS IS THE GAME FOR YOU! IT HAS EVERYTHING THAT MAKES A 5 STAR GAME! YOU CAN BE DIFFERENT CHARACTERS! FROM A WOMAN SQUARE, TO A BLACK SQUARE, THIS GAME WILL LEAVE YOU IN THE DUST, NOT KNOWING WHAT TO EXPECT! NOT TO MENTION, IT'S 2D! BUY TODAY!

This game is a great pick-up and play type games that is endless fun.But if any of the game developers read this PLEASE,PLEASE,PLEASE fix the crash on Windows 8. Other than that this game is great for long car rides to play on your laptops and it's just a great 8-bit game in general. This game is also compleatley FREE, so why not give it a go. I rate this game an 8.5/10 (I would give it a 9/10 if the crash on Windows 8 were fixed).

This game is filled with wonderful design choices and lots of love.  The way to score changes your weapons, in the form of crates collected on the ground giving a point each. The way to stay alive is kill enemies, as they like to pile up around you at super speed.   These are excellent gameplay mechanics that not only reinforce and support eachother, but also serve to constantly introduce new excitement and challenges to the experience.  Super Crate Box introduces these mechanics easily, one by one; picking this game up and getting the most out of it is seamless.  AND IT'S FREE? WHAT?

Super Crate Box is a Free 2D Retro shooting platformer game. Hard to play. Had 8bit music and 8bit graphics.   Try it, only if you like Retro games.    It was buggy, it didn't like my keyboard, one key automatically stuck. I was able to get it to work for a few minutes and tried playing the Tutorial. I died badly, could not play very well. I don't like platformer games much, and was not impressed with the Retro look, the song was catchy for a few minutes.   For more info see these youtube videos.  Review gameplay from TotalBiscuit.         YouTube™ Video:  WTF Is... - Super Crate Box ?
Addictive score attack game. It's free so just try it, you have nothing to lose.

This is a short, fun game. There is no seriousness in it. Same goes for diversity. Its basically the same level over and over with new guns added; every time you try to get as many crates as you can before your impending doom. For a free game its pretty good.

This is the BEST arcade game that you can play when you are bored. The platform type game is very well mixed with the crates that you pick up. Crates give you weapons, you use the weapons to kill enemies. The more crates you get in one life add to a score until you die, each time the goal is to get higher than your last score
Pretty funny game! Fun to play at school or short periods, but it gets very boring in the long run.

Started watching Northernlion play this on the NLSS, fell in love with it intantly. As soon as I heard it was free i squee'd with delight and hurried to download it. I've never been happier with a free game in my life. I recommend this to all!

This game is wonderful for what you get. It's simple, addictive, and can keep you going for hours. The guns, characters, the way the whole game works is fantastic. The music is catchy too. It surprises you by being a lot more difficult than you'd think. For me, I've been having a bit of issues. The game crashes once I kill either a big enemy with a shotgun or when i use the flamethrower against multiple enemies.  +Simple, easy to use +The whole idea is awesome +The guns are realistic +The music is catchy +Extremely high frames per second, ~65 for me +Addictive +Lots to unlock  -Crashes when you overload the game just a bit too much (I have 16GB of RAM and it still crashes) -Scores required to unlock difficulties is WAY exaggerated  Overall, it's free, it takes up such little space on your hard drive, requires the littlest of things to run, and will keep you playing until you want to die.  Get the game.  Now.
Very Adicting Game...   I LOVE IT!
is a good game but does not work on windows 8

Kept crashing, then saying it was running. If you can get it to work, a hearty recommendation, but I personally can't.  EDIT: Got it to work now, and it's great to play or simply watch. You do have to download something from the dev's website, though, so that's a bit of a p*sser.  EDIT 2: im addicted please help  EDIT 3: Seriously, though, this is a great game. Mechanically beautiful is the fact that, with each new weapon your strategy completely changes. It still crashes occasionally, but that's made up for by the fact that it's got a great soundtrack. The song for the first level in particular is one of those greats (like the theme for Plants vs. Zombies) that never gets annoying, ever. Maybe it's just within context of gameplay.

A bit of an addictive platformer and pretty retro with the sounds and graphics. Despite being incredibly simple and easy to pick up, the game still evolves as new weapons and stages are unlocked. In some aspects, it's not terribly hard - anyone can unlock the next weapon with enough trial-and-error. But I have yet to meet a soul who has survived for more than 5 minutes on any level. Although it's a decent game (and free), it's important to note that it was created with Game Maker, which as of now is known to have problems running on Windows 8.

Though on the surface Super Crate Box may look like a silly, 5-minutes of intertainment kind of game, it's very well thought out. The gameplay is exciting and well balanced, and a variety of unlockable weapons and gamemodes keep things fresh. Though its fun just to causally boot up and play for a few minutes to kill some time, SCB seems to have an endlessly high skillcap, and it's really neat to see how your skills improve over time. Also, it's free! :D

This game is fantasic! The concept is amazingly simple, but the gameplay is perfect! What I like about the mechanics is that you can make a choice. 'Go for the crate and lose my minigun, or keep it and wait for the coast to clear?' If this was an arcade machine when I was a kid, I would spend every last quarter.

This game was a big rage game for me, until i learned what i was doing. Now, it's one of the more fun games i have to play. This game will not let you easily go to the bathroom. Because once you die, you go right back into it, only to ask yourself 'whyyy did I do that? whatever, next death, for sure.' (Rinse and repeat) I give this game an 8/10. It has it's moments still, expecially with that damn disk gun and gernade launcher. PLUS, it might just be TOO addicting. But hey, better then being addicted to coke.

This Game may seem simple and stupid and boring. The low graphics might bother you. You might not like arcadey-feeling games. But all that goes out the window when you start to play this game.  It is soooooo addicting and soooo fun. And best of all cmepletely free.  My only complaint is that this game crashes constantly. It annoys you out of your mind especially when youve beaten your records or have a really high score and it crashes in the middle of you playing and you lose it all. This also makes it take much longer to unlock all of the weapons. However the constant crashing makes you want to play even more to triumph and say that you finnally beat the computer.   Also If you like this game go and buy the iOS game Muffin Knight. This is a copy of that game, even though that one is better.  All in all I give it 9/10 because of all of the crashing. Please fix it.

Super Crate Box is one of the most addicting arcade games I've played in a long while. While there is relatively little content to unlock (and I would gladly pay a few bucks for some sweet DLC), Vlambeer's gone ahead and made a unique little game that I've put many hours into, thanks to it's simple yet challenging mechanics.

I have more hours on this game from playing it on my flash drive at the school computers because it's one of the few games that worked so excuse that.  Basically the game is about you playing as this little guy who collects boxes. Think of these boxes as points. But the thing is every time you collect a box you get a new cool gun. Easy right? Nah, there's bad guys trying to kill you. Don't touch them! The game progresses with more levels, player characters, and guns. The soundtrack is good and the sound effects of the guns feel good.  Overall fun game, and hey, it's even free! :D

Completely free little game from the makers of Ridiculous Fishing. This has been a great time waster for me. Normally, I'm not one to care about high scores, but I enjoy seeing just how long I can keep my concentration up in this 2D single room arena platforming shooter. If that confuses you, think pre-Superfied Mario Bros. with guns. The goal is just to survive against waves of enemies, picking up crate boxes of various weapons. Good luck with the Disc Gun, that dang thing gets me every time. Oh, and did I mention, it's entirely absolutely free? 5/5
This game was a very pleasant surprise. Great arcade game for a great price. Get it now!

Another fun vlambeer game bogged down by bugs and poor quality in general -Tons of users suffer from gamebreaking crash bugs. -Hitboxes for player and enemy collision are much bigger than the sprite seems to imply -Many of the weapons are bad, which puts you at the RNG's mercy -did a box spawn on the lower levels of the arena? good luck getting back up with those dual pistols, or even disc gun!

Game sucks....  just kidding, it doesnt really sucks, its more like unbalanced, amazingly unbalanced.  Well, the mechanics are simple, its like an arcade platformer where you basically have to constantly shoot green foes and fliying ghosts (the highest unbalance factor), you gotta recolect crates to raise your score, so you can unlock gamemodes such as SFMT......  Now... im barely at SFMT, and i can tell you this, this game sucks, why? because it gets impossible past the regular 'Normal' Mode, once you get to SFMT, the quantity of enemies gets rised up x5 at least, and your firepower does not...  You may ask, why is that a problem?, well, try getting a crate right next to the spawn point on top of the map............. yeah no.

This game has a simple concept - Keep collecting crates and survive as long as you can. While this is not necessarily a bad game, it's just not for me. The whole thing is very repetitive, from the general gameplay down to the music. Switching weapons every time you pick up a crate is annoying, especially since it's random.   All things considered, this isn't a game I'd pay for, but for free, it's not a bad time waster.

This game is full of a flying enemy which appears to be a skull, it moves on a special plane and follows you, when I am attempting to kill a hoard it becomes annoying because It is very difficult to kill it as it has a rubber band effect. In the classic arcade venue you are trying to copy which is the original super mario by my guess, enemies took one hit, this ensured proper gameplay flow, having a tank like whatever this thing is disrupts the flow of gameplay, I play alot of old NES and SNES and THAT is what you should emulate if you are claiming it makes me think of it, instead it makes me think of a waste of my time. that is why my rating, is 3/10
